course_description: Chem 157 will provide extra class meeting to build and reinforce student skills and conceptual understanding related to Chem 150, while also building a general framework of habits and mindset to promote self-efficacy and success in further chemistry courses and other academic endeavors.
prerequisites: CHEM 150 6 as co-requisite. Students must enroll in CHEM 150 6 first (class number 3522)
sections: Class Nbr: 3326, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: A. Brathwaite, Status: Open
